programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A sailor falls foul of the schemes of his so-called closest friend, and ends up languishing in prison for 13 years, wrongly accused of treason. After spending his sentence plotting revenge on the traitor, he eventually manages to escape and poses as a wealthy nobleman to gain access to his target. Swashbuckling adventure based on the novel by Alexandre Dumas, starring Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris and Dagmara Dominczyk.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school students are drawn into the jungle setting of a video game. However, their digital alter egos are not what they expected. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.(n)

programme.title: The Juror
programme.desc: A mobster threatens to have a juror's son murdered if she fails to persuade the other 11 members of the jury to return a verdict of not guilty in the trial of a Mafia kingpin. Psychological thriller, starring Demi Moore, Alec Baldwin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, James Gandolfini and Anne Heche.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: When the creator of a device able to record and play a person's memories is found dead, his reclusive wife delves deeper into her own private world to crack the mystery. Hi-tech murdery mystery, starring Peter Dinklage, Matt Ellis and Jordana Largy.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker.

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: A cat burglar fresh out of prison is blackmailed by a couple of crazed billionaires into stealing the hidden components of a device created by Leonardo da Vinci that will allow them to turn lead into gold. He also has to contend with the CIA following his every move. Comedy adventure, starring Bruce Willis, Danny Aiello, Andie MacDowell, Richard E Grant, Sandra Bernhard and James Coburn.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.

programme.title: Heartlock
programme.desc: A male inmate exploits a female guard's emotions to help him escape from prison. Crime drama, starring Alexander Dreymon, Lesley-Ann Brandt and Erik LaRay Harvey.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: Three friends on a wilderness excursion must outrun a white collar criminal hell-bent on retrieving his cash, but soon their greed turns them against each other. Crime drama, starring Ellar Coltrane, Willa Fitzgerald and Jacob Artist.

programme.title: All The Money in the World
programme.desc: When 16-year-old John Paul Getty III is kidnapped in 1973, his devoted mother tries to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Michelle Williams, Christopher Plummer and Mark Wahlberg.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: A widow boards a plane with her daughter and promptly falls asleep. When she wakes up, the girl has disappeared - and the mother's fear turns to outright panic when the aircraft crew insists she boarded the flight alone, suggesting the child is merely a figment of her distressed imagination. Thriller, starring Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean and Greta Scacchi.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.

programme.title: All The Money in the World
programme.desc: When 16-year-old John Paul Getty III is kidnapped in 1973, his devoted mother tries to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom. Ridley Scott's fact-based drama, starring Michelle Williams, Christopher Plummer and Mark Wahlberg.

programme.title: Rise Of The Footsoldier 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster Pat Tate rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. Prequel, starring Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone and Roland Manookian.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A philosophy-reading kung fu expert gains a reputation as the best bouncer around, and is hired by the owner of a rowdy Missouri bar to keep the peace. When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Numb
programme.desc: An impoverished couple discover GPS coordinates that promise to lead to stolen gold. They team up with a pair of mysterious hitchhikers to recover the coins from a wintry wilderness. Thriller, starring Jamie Bamber, Marie Avgeropoulos, Aleks Paunovic and Stefanie Von Pfetten.(n)

programme.title: The Shanghai Job
programme.desc: A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai, but is ambushed during the journey. Action thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Lei Wu and Simon Yam.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: FBI agent Gretchen Blair finds herself caught in the middle of an elaborate mid-air heist. Thriller, starring Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren and Chuck Liddell.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker.(n)

programme.title: The Shanghai Job
programme.desc: A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai, but is ambushed during the journey. Action thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Lei Wu and Simon Yam.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: The Juror
programme.desc: A mobster threatens to have a juror's son murdered if she fails to persuade the other 11 members of the jury to return a verdict of not guilty in the trial of a Mafia kingpin. Psychological thriller, starring Demi Moore, Alec Baldwin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, James Gandolfini and Anne Heche.(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part IV: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Hockey-masked serial killer Jason is resurrected again, and sets his sights on a fresh batch of unlucky teenagers in Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Kimberly Beck, Crispin Glover, Ted White and Corey Feldman.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning
programme.desc: Teenagers at a remote mental hospital are dispatched in quick succession by a murderer who bears a remarkable resemblance to deceased hockey mask-wearing killer Jason Voorhees, leading to suspicions that a deranged copycat killer is on the loose. Horror sequel, starring Melanie Kinnaman, John Shepherd and Shavar Ross.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
programme.desc: Mass-murderer Jason Voorhees' corpse is re-animated yet again, this time by a bolt of lightning, and rises from the grave to embark on another blood-drenched killing spree. Horror, starring Thom Mathews, Jennifer Cooke and CJ Graham.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited sci-fi sequel, which sees Harrison Ford returning as Deckard alongside Ryan Gosling and Jared Leto.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright.

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: A student dies after an attempted exorcism by a priest who was convinced she was possessed by evil spirits. A sceptical lawyer is assigned to defend the cleric against the charge of manslaughter, but as the case unfolds she finds her own convictions challenged. Horror drama, starring Tom Wilkinson, Laura Linney, Jennifer Carpenter, Campbell Scott and Colm Feore.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: An American diplomat secretly adopts a newborn baby when his own son dies at birth. As a series of unusual deaths occurs around him, he gradually comes to suspect the child he is raising is the son of the Devil. Richard Donner's horror, starring Gregory Peck, Lee Remick, Billie Whitelaw, David Warner and Patrick Troughton, with Jerry Goldsmith supplying the Oscar-winning score.

programme.title: Damien: Omen II
programme.desc: Teenage Damien is adopted by his rich uncle and aunt, who are unaware of his true origins, and packed off to military academy. But as he becomes aware of his demonic destiny as the Antichrist, another series of grisly murders begins. Horror sequel, starring Jonathan Scott-Taylor, William Holden, Lee Grant, Robert Foxworth, Lew Ayres, Sylvia Sidney and Lance Henriksen.

programme.title: Omen III: The Final Conflict
programme.desc: Antichrist Damien Thorn becomes US Ambassador to Britain, and while engineering dominion over the entire world, he ensures all babies born on a certain day are slaughtered, in the certainty that one of them is the second coming of Christ. Supernatural horror, starring Sam Neill, Rossano Brazzi and Don Gordon.

Supernatural horror, starring Sam Neill, Rossano Brazzi and Don Gordon.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
programme.desc: A telepathic woman accidentally sets supernatural serial killer Jason free to kill again, and soon realises she must use her psychic powers to defeat the monster and save herself from a grisly fate. Horror sequel, with Lar Park Lincoln, Kevin Spirtas and Kane Hodder.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Frighteners
programme.desc: A psychic conman uses his mental powers and three ghostly sidekicks to create hauntings, which he then accepts payment to exorcise. However, he soon has to contend with a supernatural serial killer, who has returned from the grave to continue his murder spree. Peter Jackson's comedy horror, starring Michael J Fox, Dee Wallace Stone, Julianna McCarthy and John Astin.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Twelve years after the death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from an orphanage into their home. There they become the target of the craftsman's possessed creation, Annabelle. Horror, starring Anthony LaPaglia, Samara Lee and Miranda Otto.

programme.title: John Carpenter's The Ward
programme.desc: An amnesiac woman is committed to a psychiatric hospital after setting fire to a barn in the 1960s. She is haunted by visions of a mysterious shadowy presence and as several of her fellow patients go missing, she realises there is something supernatural haunting the institution and preying on the patients. Horror, with Amber Heard and Lyndsy Fonseca.

programme.title: Pyewacket
programme.desc: An angst-ridden teenage girl awakens something in the woods when she naively performs an occult ritual to kill her mother. Horror, starring Nicole Munoz, Laurie Holden and Chloe Rose.

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A family experiences strange events after invisible phantoms invade its home. At first the ghosts seem harmless, simply making things move by themselves. But before long, they spirit away the five-year-old daughter to their own plane of existence, forcing her parents to call on paranormal researchers to find their missing child. Horror, with JoBeth Williams, Craig T Nelson and Heather O'Rourke.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
programme.desc: Undead psychopath Jason Voorhees returns from the grave once more, travelling on a New York-bound cruise ship packed with potential victims. Horror sequel, starring Jensen Daggett, Kane Hodder, Scott Reeves and Barbara Bingham.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husband's murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill.(n)

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly plague, one desperate family agrees to shelter another, but can they be trusted? Horror thriller, starring Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott and Carmen Ejogo.(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.(n)

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Recently deceased couple Adam and Barbara Maitland enlist the professional services of a hard-boiled veteran ghost to scare away the obnoxious yuppie family who have moved into their former home. Tim Burton's supernatural comedy, starring Michael Keaton, Geena Davis, Alec Baldwin, Winona Ryder, Jeffrey Jones and Catherine O'Hara.(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of their small New England town. Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis.(n)

Tim Burton's supernatural comedy, starring Michael Keaton, Geena Davis, Alec Baldwin, Winona Ryder, Jeffrey Jones and Catherine O'Hara.(n)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Homicidal madman Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution 15 years after murdering his sister, and goes on a killing spree in his home town. Although a psychiatrist is quickly on his trail in a bid to stop the loss of more lives, a shy teenage girl babysitting for her neighbour is unaware of the grisly fate in store for her. John Carpenter's horror, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Donald Pleasence, Nick Castle and PJ Soles.(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of their small New England town. Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.

programme.title: The Forgiven
programme.desc: After the end of Apartheid, Archbishop Desmond Tutu meets with a brutal murderer seeking redemption. Director Roland Joffe's thriller, starring Forest Whitaker, Eric Bana and Jeff Gum.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: A young boy shipped off to his grandad's remote cattle station finds friendship and adventure with a one-of-a-kind dog. Family drama, starring Levi Miller and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: When a network of satellites designed to control the global climate starts to attack the Earth, it's a race against time for its creator to uncover the real threat before a worldwide storm wipes out everything and everyone. Sci-fi thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess and Abbie Cornish.

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: With the Resistance cornered, aspiring warrior Rey tries to recruit Luke Skywalker in her battle against Kylo Ren and his evil forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Mark Hamill, Daisy Ridley, Adam Driver and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village, and soon realise how dangerous the region is. Fact-based adventure, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Thomas Kretschmann and Alex Russell.

programme.title: Scottish Mussel
programme.desc: An illegal pearl fisher has a change of heart when he falls in love with a conservationist. Romantic comedy, directed by and starring Talulah Riley, with Martin Compston, Morgan Watkins and Joe Thomas.

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: A single mum sets out to rescue an abused girl using instructions from her genius son's notebook. Drama, starring Naomi Watts and Jacob Tremblay. Directed by Jurassic World's Colin Trevorrow.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic soldier uses technology that allows him to control a genetically engineered body on a mission to a dangerous jungle world. His assignment is to infiltrate an alien tribe on behalf of a corrupt mining corporation, which wants to drive them from their land. He comes to sympathise with the natives, and helps them fight back against his employers. James Cameron's sci-fi adventure, starring Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: In a future plagued with overpopulation, a man realises he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall. Alexander Payne's sci-fi comedy, starring Matt Damon and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: A thirtysomething single woman fears she may never have children and decides to undergo artificial insemination. However, shortly after leaving the clinic, she meets the man of her dreams but must decide how to break the news she may shortly be pregnant. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen and Anthony Anderson.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary is pulled into a centuries-old battle between Chinese warriors and giant, lizard-like monsters. Fantasy adventure, starring Matt Damon, Willem Dafoe and Tian Jing.

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic soldier uses technology that allows him to control a genetically engineered body on a mission to a dangerous jungle world. His assignment is to infiltrate an alien tribe on behalf of a corrupt mining corporation, which wants to drive them from their land. He comes to sympathise with the natives, and helps them fight back against his employers. James Cameron's sci-fi adventure, starring Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver and Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: In a future plagued with overpopulation, a man realises he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall. Alexander Payne's sci-fi comedy, starring Matt Damon and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: A single mum sets out to rescue an abused girl using instructions from her genius son's notebook. Drama, starring Naomi Watts and Jacob Tremblay. Directed by Jurassic World's Colin Trevorrow.

programme.title: Non-Transferable
programme.desc: Dumped by her boyfriend and stuck with non-refundable tickets for a romantic getaway, a young woman looks for a stand-in. Romantic comedy, starring Ashley Clements, Brendan Bradley and Shanna Malcolm.(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Having sworn revenge against his relative's widow, a young Englishman finds his plans soon change after they finally meet. Drama based on the Daphne Du Maurier novel, starring Rachel Weisz, Sam Claflin and Holliday Grainger.(n)

programme.title: First Man: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new Neil Armstrong biopic from La La Land director Damien Chazelle, starring Ryan Gosling.(n)

programme.title: Burn Country
programme.desc: An aspiring Afghan journalist moves to small-town California and begins investigating the disappearance of a local. Mystery drama, starring James Franco, Melissa Leo, Dominic Rains and Rachel Brosnahan.(n)

programme.title: American Wrestler: The Wizard
programme.desc: In 1980, a teenager escapes the unrest in Iran only to face more hostility in America, due to the hostage crisis. Determined to fit in, he joins the school's troubled wrestling team. Drama, starring George Kosturos, William Fichtner and Ali Afshar.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.(n)

programme.title: Fugitives
programme.desc: A couple head to the Bahamas, hoping to revive their flagging marriage, but are soon fighting for their lives after being hunted by modern day pirates. Thriller, starring Dominic Purcell, Tricia Helfer and Luke Mably.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)
A man's life is derailed when a disturbing pattern of events repeats itself in the same manner every day, ending at 2.22 pm. Thriller, starring Michiel Huisman, Teresa Palmer and Maeve Dermody.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their peaceful existence. Drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris and Michelle Pfeiffer.(n)

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: Experienced and pragmatic Seoul detective Seo Do-cheol visits the Sun-jinn corporation's headquarters to investigate the suicide of his friend Bae, who supposedly killed himself after protesting against being sacked from his job for joining a union. The detective grows suspicious and soon finds himself pitted against the heir to the business and his henchmen. Comedy crime drama, starring Jung-min Hwang. In Korean.

programme.title: The Last Wagon
programme.desc: A mixed-race renegade is convicted for the murder of his wife's killers and transported to prison in a wagon train. When the party is attacked by Apaches, the only survivors are the prisoner and a group of orphaned children, so he takes responsibility for leading them to safety. Western, with Richard Widmark, Felicia Farr, Ray Stricklyn and Susan Kohner.

programme.title: Terror in a Texas Town
programme.desc: An embittered Scandinavian seaman sets out to avenge the murder of his farmer father, who was killed after refusing to bow to the demands of a ruthless land baron. Western, starring Sterling Hayden, Sebastian Cabot, Carol Kelly and Eugene Martin.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron.

programme.title: Master of the World
programme.desc: A Victorian hot air balloon expedition is captured by the captain of a hi-tech airship who intends to use his craft to bring about world peace by destroying military installations across the world. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novels, starring Vincent Price and Charles Bronson, with Henry Hull and Mary Webster.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Seven English pensioners looking for a fresh start are drawn to an advert for a hotel in the Indian city of Jaipur, and plan to spend their retirement there. They arrive to find the building dilapidated but are won over by the enthusiastic young manager, and each embarks on their own adventures in the city. Comedy drama, starring Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover.

programme.title: Stand Up Guys
programme.desc: An ageing gangster is released from prison after 28 years, and is reunited with his two partners in crime. They set out to recapture their glory days with one last burst of criminal activity, but one of the trio is under pressure from a Mob boss and has a dangerous secret that threatens them all. Crime comedy, starring Al Pacino, Christopher Walken and Alan Arkin.

programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: Premiere. Deep in the heart of New York's notoriously secretive Hasidic Jewish community, grocery store clerk Menashe struggles against tradition to keep custody of his only son after his wife passes away. Drama, starring Menashe Lustig. In Yiddish.

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war-weary pilot returns home from service in Europe, but his welcome is far from warm. Not only must he deal with the news of his wife's infidelities, but he also finds himself accused of her murder. However, the wife of his dead spouse's lover is on hand to help him prove his innocence. Thriller, written by Raymond Chandler and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix and Doris Dowling.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff
programme.desc: A drifter in need of money takes the job of sheriff in a small mining outpost, and chooses the town drunk to be his deputy. Events take a chaotic turn when a family of influential crooks decides to pull out all the stops to do away with the lawman. Comedy Western, starring James Garner, Joan Hackett, Jack Elam, Bruce Dern and Walter Brennan.

programme.title: Gun Fury
programme.desc: A wealthy rancher and his fiancee take the stagecoach to California, where they intend to start a new life in the wake of the Civil War. However, during the journey an ex-Confederate outlaw and his gang of thugs attack the coach and kidnap the bride-to-be. Distraught and wounded, the rancher sets out to rescue her and punish her abductors. Western, with Rock Hudson, Donna Reed, Lee Marvin and Phil Carey.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: A corrupt senator coaxes Colonel Custer out of retirement with the prospect of presidential office, and the soldier tries to further his political ambitions by wresting control of the current military campaign from its commanding officer, culminating in his last stand at the Battle of the Little Bighorn. Western, with Philip Carey, Joseph Cotten, Darren McGavin and Julie Sommars.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.

programme.title: Young Adult
programme.desc: A selfish teenager grows up to be an alcoholic failed writer. When she learns her high-school sweetheart's wife has just had a baby, she refuses to believe he can be happy without her, and returns to her home town to steal him away from his happy family, finding an unlikely ally in a classmate whose adolescence she made a misery. Comedy, starring Charlize Theron, Patrick Wilson and Patton Oswalt.(n)

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: A widower visits a town where the men he believes murdered his wife are about to be hanged. When they escape from jail, he takes the law into his own hands and decides to hunt down and kill the fugitives. But over time, he begins to question whether his actions are right. Western, starring Gregory Peck, Joan Collins and Stephen Boyd.(n)

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: An American infantry lieutenant fighting in German-occupied Belgium is convinced an inept but well-connected officer is not fit for command. When his unit are wiped out after another of the officer's mistakes, the lieutenant miraculously survives and returns to base seeking revenge. Second World War drama, starring Jack Palance, Eddie Albert, Lee Marvin, Buddy Ebsen and Robert Strauss.(n)

programme.title: The Battle at Apache Pass
programme.desc: Apache chief Cochise resolves to make a treaty allowing his people to live in peace with white settlers. However, his hot-headed fellow leader Geronimo disagrees, and puts the negotiations at risk by embarking on a murder spree, incurring the wrath of his enemies. Western, with John Lund, Jeff Chandler and Susan Cabot.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: A headmaster hopes to land a more prestigious job at a better school, but his pupils do not want him to leave. When two inspectors pay a visit, the mischievous students see a chance to sabotage his career plans with a series of pranks. Comedy, starring Ted Ray, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Kenneth Williams.(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist carries out genetic experiments on apes, hoping to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease. A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis.(n)

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: Premiere. A teenager finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move starts to become manipulated by an anonymous community of watchers. Action thriller, starring Emma Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An LAPD cop discovers a psychotic criminal has planted a bomb on a crowded bus, primed to go off if the vehicle drops below 50mph. He boards the vehicle and helps a hapless passenger who has been forced to take the wheel and keep a constant speed to avoid a disaster. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Dennis Hopper and Jeff Daniels.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Bulbs
programme.desc: Bob Wallace prides himself on always having the most spectacular Christmas lights in his town, but this year, he discovers his new neighbour has an equally festive display. This leads to a bitter rivalry as they go to ridiculous lengths to outshine each other. Comedy, with Daniel Stern and Matt Frewer.

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.

programme.title: A Christmas Song
programme.desc: Two schools are merged, and rivalries develop between students and staff. The music teachers from the two schools realise that only one of them will be kept on as they coach their choirs for a televised singing contest - but their professional and artistic conflicts are complicated by their growing feelings for each other. Romantic drama, with Natasha Henstridge and Gabe Hogan.

programme.title: A Recipe for a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A would-be restaurant critic must complete her first article by Christmas Eve to guarantee her future career, but a visit from her overbearing mother leaves her with little time to work. The writer persuades a restaurateur to date her mother in return for a glowing review, only to see the fake romance unexpectedly turn into a real one. Comedy, starring Christine Baranski, Carly Pope and Bobby Cannavale.

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards.

programme.title: Mr St Nick
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides it is time to hang up his hat and hand the reins of the family business over to his son - who is less than enthusiastic about donning the famed red suit, preferring to spend his time on Miami Beach, throwing the future of the festive season into doubt. Festive comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Charles Durning and Elaine Hendrix.

programme.title: Love for Christmas
programme.desc: An unhappily engaged woman begins to regret her choice of fiance, while a lonely naval officer returns to his home town facing an uncertain future. They are brought together over the Christmas period by two dogs and love blossoms as they both become involved in a production of A Christmas Carol. Romantic comedy, with Shantel VanSanten and Rob Mayes.

programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.

programme.desc: A sensitive youngster writes a letter to Santa Claus asking to be taken away from his battling parents so they can rebuild their crumbling relationship - prompting a reporter and a novelist to team up and track down the troubled child. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Patricia Heaton and Isabella Fink.

programme.title: Cancel Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus discovers that Christmas is in danger of being cancelled because children are too greedy. He decides to prove otherwise, adopting a disguise and visiting two kids and teaching them about the importance of charity. Fantasy, starring Judd Nelson, Justin Landry, Natalie Brown and John Fleming.

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A couple in a small New England town during the Second World War await the return of their two sons and daughter for Christmas. Drama, starring Hal Holbrook, Eva Marie Saint, Jason Oliver, Courteney Cox, Peter Gallagher and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: A Christmas Snow
programme.desc: A woman refuses to celebrate Christmas, because of her father abandoning his family during the holiday. When a fierce blizzard strikes her town in the run-up to the big day, she is forced to give shelter to two strangers, and as she gets to know them, she begins to rethink her bitter outlook on life. Festive drama, starring Catherine Mary Stewart and Muse Watson.

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Two children discover a sack full of money at the local mall and head off on a festive spending spree. However, the crooks who counterfeited the cash are soon hot on their heels. Family comedy, starring Patrick Swayze, Matthew Knight, Amy and Zoe Schlagel, Tim Curry and Carmen Electra.

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: A spoiled 15-year-old demands a horse for Christmas, while a stable hand is tired of being mistreated by her foster siblings and simply wants a real family. When the girls make wishes one Christmas, they find themselves swapping lives, which soon leads them to appreciate what they had. Comedy drama, starring Amber Benson, Tygh Runyan and Britt McKillip.

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: A woman taking a trip through the mountains stumbles on the holiday lodge where she spent many happy Christmases as a child, only to find it has fallen into ruin. Inspired by her grandfather, she sets about restoring it, and falls in love with a man who also has a special connection to the building. Romantic drama, with Erin Karpluk and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stealing Christmas
programme.desc: A fugitive lies low in a small town, where he starts to plan his next job on the local bank. However, as he gets involved in the everyday life of the community - even playing Santa for the children - he is dogged by doubts and second thoughts as he reflects on how warmly the residents have welcomed him. Crime comedy, starring Tony Danza, Lea Thompson and Betty White.

programme.title: The 12 Dogs of Christmas
programme.desc: A youngster is sent to live in an isolated town as her father searches for work during the Depression. She's shocked to discover the mayor has banned all dogs - which causes something of a problem when she finds a puppy and instantly falls in love. Festive family drama, starring John Billingsley, Susan Wood and Jordan-Claire Green.

programme.desc: Santa's evil twin attempts to pervert the course of Christmas, forcing children to bring gifts to him, but one brave youngster sets out to foil his plan and restore festive cheer to the world. Adventure, starring Andre Bourque, Colin McLane and Amy Stromer.

programme.title: Twice Upon a Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's good daughter prepares to give up her immortal life for love, but does not count on the scheming of her evil sister, who is planning to turn their homeland into a massive gambling resort. Festive drama sequel, starring Kathy Ireland, John Dye and Arturo Gill.

programme.title: The Christmas Star
programme.desc: A con man dresses up as Santa Claus to break out of jail and recover his hidden stash of stolen loot. However, his perfect little plan is thrown into chaos after he's mistaken for the genuine article by two inquisitive kids - who end up making life very difficult indeed. Disney fantasy comedy, starring Ed Asner, Fred Gwynne, Rene Auberjonois and Susan Tyrrell.

programme.title: Ms Scrooge
programme.desc: A mean-spirited banker is persuaded to change her ways when she is visited by a series of ghosts on Christmas eve. Festive fantasy inspired by Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, with Cicely Tyson and Katherine Helmond.

programme.title: 3 Day Christmas
programme.desc: A distraught father realises he and his family have forgotten how to communicate, so comes up with a drastic solution. He locks his wife and children in the house for the Christmas holiday, and cuts off the water and electricity to force them to reconnect with each other. Comedy, starring George Newbern, Megyn Price and Corbin Bernsen, who also directed.(n)

programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens.(n)

Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin.(n)

programme.desc: Jason Robards stars as a widower who, not wanting to face his first Christmas alone, responds to a newspaper advert asking for `social introductions'. Sentimental drama, co-starring Julie Harris, Don Francks and James Eckhouse.(n)

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario.

programme.title: Battle of the Bulbs
programme.desc: Bob Wallace prides himself on always having the most spectacular Christmas lights in his town, but this year, he discovers his new neighbour has an equally festive display. This leads to a bitter rivalry as they go to ridiculous lengths to outshine each other. Comedy, with Daniel Stern and Matt Frewer.

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.

programme.title: A Christmas Song
programme.desc: Two schools are merged, and rivalries develop between students and staff. The music teachers from the two schools realise that only one of them will be kept on as they coach their choirs for a televised singing contest - but their professional and artistic conflicts are complicated by their growing feelings for each other. Romantic drama, with Natasha Henstridge and Gabe Hogan.

programme.title: A Recipe for a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A would-be restaurant critic must complete her first article by Christmas Eve to guarantee her future career, but a visit from her overbearing mother leaves her with little time to work. The writer persuades a restaurateur to date her mother in return for a glowing review, only to see the fake romance unexpectedly turn into a real one. Comedy, starring Christine Baranski, Carly Pope and Bobby Cannavale.

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards.

programme.title: A Christmas Snow
programme.desc: A woman refuses to celebrate Christmas, because of her father abandoning his family during the holiday. When a fierce blizzard strikes her town in the run-up to the big day, she is forced to give shelter to two strangers, and as she gets to know them, she begins to rethink her bitter outlook on life. Festive drama, starring Catherine Mary Stewart and Muse Watson.

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Two children discover a sack full of money at the local mall and head off on a festive spending spree. However, the crooks who counterfeited the cash are soon hot on their heels. Family comedy, starring Patrick Swayze, Matthew Knight, Amy and Zoe Schlagel, Tim Curry and Carmen Electra.

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: A spoiled 15-year-old demands a horse for Christmas, while a stable hand is tired of being mistreated by her foster siblings and simply wants a real family. When the girls make wishes one Christmas, they find themselves swapping lives, which soon leads them to appreciate what they had. Comedy drama, starring Amber Benson, Tygh Runyan and Britt McKillip.

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: A woman taking a trip through the mountains stumbles on the holiday lodge where she spent many happy Christmases as a child, only to find it has fallen into ruin. Inspired by her grandfather, she sets about restoring it, and falls in love with a man who also has a special connection to the building. Romantic drama, with Erin Karpluk and Michael Shanks.

programme.desc: Santa's good daughter prepares to give up her immortal life for love, but does not count on the scheming of her evil sister, who is planning to turn their homeland into a massive gambling resort. Festive drama sequel, starring Kathy Ireland, John Dye and Arturo Gill.

programme.title: California Dreaming
programme.desc: In the wake of the Kavanaugh confirmation, The Circus travels to California to take the temperature of the political and policy resistance to the Trump administration. With almost a dozen house seats currently held by Republicans in serious contention, any potential blue wave in the midterm elections will begin here. The hosts interview key players from across the political spectrum to determine the current state of California politics, how they got where they are, and where they are headed.(c)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is a successful sports agent who must start over and rebuild his life from the ground up. Also starring Cuba Gooding, Jr., Renee Zellweger and Kelly Preston.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar winning performance).

programme.desc: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

programme.title: The Jerk

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Leonard (Guy Pearce) is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife. The difficulty, however, of locating his wife's killer is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he's going, or why.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Tony Montana in Brian De Palma's remake of the 1932 gangster classic. Failing to make it legitimately, Tony and his friend Manny Ray turn to a life of crime, building a successful drug empire in 1980s Miami. But as Tony's power grows, so does his list of enemies, ego, and paranoia. Featuring an all-star cast including Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Robert Loggia and F. Murray Abraham.

programme.title: Sweet Virginia
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger sends shockwaves through a close-knit community. In the wake of a triple murder that leaves the residents of a remote Alaskan outpost on edge, tightly wound drifter Elwood (Christopher Abbott) checks into a motel run by Sam (Jon Bernthal), a former rodeo champion whose imposing physical presence conceals a troubled soul. Bound together by their outsider status, the two men strike up an uneasy friendship—a dangerous association that will set off a new wave of violence and unleash Sam's darkest demons.

programme.title: Serving Sara
programme.desc: Matthew Perry of "Friends" stars in this romantic comedy as a process server who falls for the spurned wife (Elizabeth Hurley) to whom he's supposed to deliver divorce papers. Bruce Campbell, Vincent Pastore, Cedric the Entertainer and Jerry Stiller costar in this likable romp from director Reginald Hudlin ("House Party," "The Ladies Man").

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Ben Stiller is back as Gaylord "Greg" Focker, the unlucky fiancé who must endure another humiliating parental exchange. Having given him their daughter's hand, Jack and Dina Byrnes (Oscar® winner Robert De Niro and Blythe Danner) now travel to Florida to meet Greg's parents - a couple who couldn't be more different from the ex-CIA agent and his wife. Oscar® winners Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand co-star as the eccentric Fockers.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) is head over heels in love with his girlfriend Pam (Teri Polo) and is ready to pop the big question. When his attempt to propose is thwarted by a phone call with the news that Pam's younger sister is getting married, Greg realizes that the key to Pam's hand in marriage lies with her formidable father, Jack Byrnes (Robert DeNiro). A trip to New York for her sister's wedding seems just the right occasion for Greg to ask Pam to be his wife. But everything that could possibly go wrong, does.

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Hunter "Patch" Adams who, after staying in a mental hospital, decides to enlist in med school to become a doctor. Determined to help patients with a unique blend of personal attention and humor, he turns the medical world upside-down with his unorthodox-but-effective treatments.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: New high school student Cameron (Gordon-Levitt) is smitten with Bianca (Oleynik), but in order to get around her father's strict rules on dating, he must get bad boy Patrick (Ledger) to date Bianca's ill-tempered sister, Kat (Stiles).

programme.title: The Tribes of Palos Verdes
programme.desc: When teenager Medina (Maika Monroe) moves with her family to the picture-postcard perfect paradise of Palos Verdes, California, they seem headed for a happy new chapter in their lives. But old troubles soon catch up to them, as Medina's parents' marriage disintegrates, her mother (Jennifer Garner) spirals into an emotional freefall, and her twin brother (Cody Fern) turns to drugs. Caught in the middle of it all, Medina must rely on her inner strength to become the stabilizing force in her family, while finding refuge in a new passion: surfing.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A humble London businessman's (Jackie Chan), long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love - his teenage daughter - is taken from him in a senseless act of politically-motivated terrorism. In his relentless search for the identity of the terrorists, he is forced into a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official (Pierce Brosnan) whose own past may hold clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: After being blinded as a child in a nearly fatal car crash that claimed her parent's lives, Gina depends on her husband James to be her eyes. She sees her world in her own imagination with help from James' descriptions. Despite her disability, the two enjoy a colorful existence in Thailand. It seems the only real hardship this loving couple faces is difficulty conceiving a child, but when Gina is given the opportunity to have a corneal transplant and regains her vision, their life and relationship are upended.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood talent rep, loses his job because of his drinking. Despondent, he goes to Las Vegas to end his life in one final binge. But on the Strip, his plans are interrupted when he meets Sera, a street-smart hooker. Ben and Sera's chance meeting becomes a respite on the road to oblivion as these two disenfranchised souls form a bond that is as mysterious as it is immutable.(n)

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: Stranded after a plane crash in the Andes mountains, individual members of Uruguay's rugby team respond differently. Group leader Nando (Ethan Hawke) tries to keep everyone's spirits up; medical student Roberto (Josh Hamilton) diligently treats cases of frostbite and gangrene; loose cannon Antonio (Vincent Spano) gradually loses his composure. Once all available food runs out, the group faces a terrible dilemma: eat one or more of their deceased teammates, or die.(n)

programme.title: The Jerk
programme.desc: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar® nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic. But when the doomed luxury liner collides with an iceberg in the frigid North Atlantic, their passionate love affair becomes a thrilling race for survival. The winner of 11 Academy Awards® including Best Picture.(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: California Dreaming
programme.desc: In the wake of the Kavanaugh confirmation, The Circus travels to California to take the temperature of the political and policy resistance to the Trump administration. With almost a dozen house seats currently held by Republicans in serious contention, any potential blue wave in the midterm elections will begin here. The hosts interview key players from across the political spectrum to determine the current state of California politics, how they got where they are, and where they are headed.(n)

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.(n)

programme.title: Face It, You're Gorgeous
programme.desc: Frank employs Liam to help him chase down a romantic connection. Lip spends the day wrangling an alcoholic actress who hired him to be her sober companion. Fiona struggles to keep up with the demands of her new investment as Ford pushes her to get serious about their relationship. Kev and V run into trouble at the twins’ preschool when show and tell goes awry.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar® nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic. But when the doomed luxury liner collides with an iceberg in the frigid North Atlantic, their passionate love affair becomes a thrilling race for survival. The winner of 11 Academy Awards® including Best Picture.(n)

programme.title: Halloween II (2009)
programme.desc: It's nearly Halloween again and the terrorized Laurie Strode awaits the dreaded return of her murderous brother Michael in this sequel remake starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Malcolm McDowell and Taylor Mane.

programme.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
programme.desc: Brent enters the halls of the Delta Bi Theta fraternity. He isn't just any pledge, he's a legacy - and it's a legacy of death. Brent is actually there to solve the mystery of his identical twin brother Brock's murder, and he'll do anything to crack the case, including an attempt at the frat's most daring prank of all time. After the prank causes two commercial jets to collide over an orphanage, they're punished to a weekend at The Old Sorority House by the Lake. But they're not the only ones there, a killer named Motherface lurks nearby.

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive.

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: Exposure
programme.desc: To reconcile the problems in their relationship, Myra and James go to a cabin in the mountains where they encounter an ancient evil that haunts the land, capable of turning people into monsters.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Primal Rage
programme.desc: Lost deep in the forest of the Pacific Northwest, Ashley and Max Carr are stalked by a terrifying creature that might be Bigfoot. Embroiled in a strange land of Native American myth and legend turned real, they must fight back against the monster in a desperate battle of life or death.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A desperate man targets a wealthy family's home to steal from. He picks the wrong night to carry out his plans however, for a masked madman has gotten there first, imprisoned the family and lined the mansion with deadly traps.

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
programme.desc: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty monsters and three friends must track them down as they begin eating their victims. It's up to them to destroy the donuts and save their sleepy little town.

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life.

programme.title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: A team of scientists made up of Jia (Li Bingbing), Ridley (Kellan Lutz), and Mason (Kelsey Grammer) are in search for a lost colleague in an ancient labyrinth. Before it's too late, the group must battle their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating funnel web spiders and find out what is behind the arachnids' power and intelligence used to protect a secret powerful elixir.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life. After surviving a horrible tragedy, she has finally moved on and is enjoying her last year of high school. Surrounded by her best friends, she should be safe from the horrors of her past. But when the night turns deadly, there is only one person who could be responsible - a man she thought was gone forever. Now, Donna and her friends must find a way to escape the sadistic rampage of an obsessed killer, and survive a night "to die for.".

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
